com.facebook.litho.choreographercompat

Class ChoreographerCompatImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.choreographercompat.ChoreographerCompatImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChoreographerCompat

    public class ChoreographerCompatImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChoreographerCompat
    Wrapper class for abstracting away availability of the JellyBean Choreographer. If Choreographer is unavailable we fallback to using a normal Handler.

    This code was taken from the facebook/rebound repository.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.facebook.litho.choreographercompat.ChoreographerCompat

        ChoreographerCompat.FrameCallback

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ChoreographerCompat getInstance()
        Returns:
        a ChoreographerCompat instance for the main thread. This should really be on ChoreographerCompat but interfaces don't support static methods until Java 8.

        NB: Unlike android.view.Choreographer#getInstance(), this method ALWAYS returns an instance that posts to the MAIN THREAD android Choreographer (and main thread Handler for API<16).

      • setInstance

        public static void setInstance(ChoreographerCompat choreographerCompat)
        Set the ChoreographerCompat instance for tests.
